sentences.en: From their grimy swing doors and shutting, there came forth a smell of and sour beer.
sentences.cn: 弹簧门一片脏兮兮,不断给人开来关去,门里边传出的那股味儿,臊乎乎,湿漉漉, 还有种啤酒香.

sentences.en: He could see grimy roofs, factory chimneys and church spires.
sentences.cn: 他可以看到肮脏的屋顶 、 工厂的烟囱和教堂的尖顶.

sentences.en: Heading south, it took 15 minutes to get beyond the town's grimy ring of light industry.
sentences.cn: 向南开15分钟的车程, 我们离开了这个灰暗小城的工业区.

sentences.en: His costume suggests work and subservience : work - goggles around his neck, a grimy face, knee - pads.
sentences.cn: 他的装束反映了他的状况,脖子上一双骨碌转的眼睛, 邋遢的脸, 护膝.

sentences.en: Imagine, Tibbs suggests, that we push grimy workaday industrial processes toward the character of biological processes.
sentences.cn: 提布斯启发说, 想象一下, 我们推动肮脏的普通工业生产方式向具有生物特性的加工方式转化.

sentences.en: Its windows are grimy with soot from Beijing's notoriously bad air.
sentences.cn: 它的窗户很脏,布满来自北京臭名昭著的坏空气的灰尘.

sentences.en: Pug rubbed a hand over his grimy stubby face.
sentences.cn: 帕格伸手摸了摸他那肮脏的、胡子拉茬的脸.

sentences.en: Something was sticking from the pocket of the little man's grimy shorts.
sentences.cn: 小个子男人脏乎乎的短裤口袋里鼓鼓的，伸出来个什么东西。

sentences.en: Suddenly a grimy hand was stuck out of the window.
sentences.cn: 忽然,从窗户伸进一只肮脏的手.

sentences.en: The blanket was warm, if grimy.
The thin phone book was grimy from being thumbed by filling station hands.
sentences.cn: 薄薄的电话薄让油污的手指翻得黑不溜秋.

trans.tran_cn: 沾满污垢的，满是灰尘的，肮脏的
